channel.title: Opening + Closing Doors *NEED MAJOR HELP*
channel.description: Hi, me and my friend are working on a server. We cannot find out how to make doors open and close :(. If i could get help that would be great!

item.title: Opening + Closing Doors *NEED MAJOR HELP*
item.dc:creator: @Zaron Zaron
item.description:
@Zaron wrote:

s p i d a z yea your dumb… I think you just gotta find a working door (most work in lumby) get the coords for them, then it’ll bring you to a big list, then you just add the door you want in there… idk but you could try it…
